snippet: RATNER--Michael. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Michael Ratner, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Michael's beloved wife, Karen Ranucci; his siblings, Bruce and Ellen; his children, Jake and Ana; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: RATNER--Michael. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Michael Ratner, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Michael's beloved wife, Karen Ranucci; his siblings, Bruce and Ellen; his children, Jake and Ana; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
